name: Leszek Miller
order: Prime Minister of Poland,  10th Prime Minister of the Third Republic of Poland
viceprimeminister: Marek Belka, Jarosław Kalinowski, Marek Pol, Jerzy Hausner
order2: Minister of Internal Affairs and Administration of the Republic of Poland
order3: Minister of Labor and Social Policy of the Republic of Poland
order4: 1st Chairman of the Democratic Left Alliance
order5: 3rd Chairman of the Social Democracy of the Republic of Poland
party: Polish United Workers' Party (until 1990), Social Democracy of the Republic of Poland (1990-1999), Democratic Left Alliance (1999-2007), Polish Left (from 2007)
